profile.bio: Long Bio is a passionate software engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in web development, particularly with React and Node.js. A graduate from MIT with a strong focus on clean architecture and Agile methodologies, John has successfully led multiple projects, from innovative startups to established tech giants. He's a firm believer in continuous learning, contributing regularly to open-source projects, and sharing insights through tech blogs and meetups.
